TestCase.name: testNestedProject
TestCase.Resource: SELECT id, deepNested.nested1.name AS nestedName, nested.`value` AS nestedValue, deepNested.nested2.flag AS nestedFlag, deepNested.nested2.num AS nestedNum FROM T

LogicalProject(id=[$0], nestedName=[$1.nested1.name], nestedValue=[$2.value], nestedFlag=[$1.nested2.flag], nestedNum=[$1.nested2.num]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]])

Calc(select=[id, deepNested_nested1_name AS nestedName, nested_value AS nestedValue, deepNested_nested2_flag AS nestedFlag, deepNested_nested2_num AS nestedNum]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T, project=[id, deepNested_nested1_name, deepNested_nested2_flag, deepNested_nested2_num, nested_value], metadata=[]]], fields=[id, deepNested_nested1_name, deepNested_nested2_flag, deepNested_nested2_num, nested_value])

TestCase.name: testNestedProjectWithItem
TestCase.Resource: SELECT `result`.`data_arr`[`id`].`value`, `result`.`data_map`['item'].`value` FROM NestedItemTable
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[ITEM($2.data_arr, $0).value], EXPR$1=[ITEM($2.data_map, _UTF-16LE'item').value]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, NestedItemTable]])

Calc(select=[ITEM(result_data_arr, id).value AS EXPR$0, ITEM(result_data_map, 'item').value AS EXPR$1]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, NestedItemTable, project=[result_data_arr, result_data_map, id], metadata=[]]], fields=[result_data_arr, result_data_map, id])

TestCase.name: testNestedProjectWithMetadata
TestCase.Resource: SELECT id, deepNested.nested1 AS nested1, deepNested.nested1.`value` + deepNested.nested2.num + metadata_1 as results FROM T

LogicalProject(id=[$0], nested1=[$1.nested1], results=[+(+($1.nested1.value, $1.nested2.num), $2)]) +- LogicalProject(id=[$0], deepNested=[$1], metadata_1=[$2], metadata_2=[$3]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T, metadata=[metadata_1, metadata_2]]])

Calc(select=[id, deepNested_nested1 AS nested1, ((deepNested_nested1.value + deepNested_nested2_num) + metadata_1) AS results]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T, project=[id, deepNested_nested1, deepNested_nested2_num], metadata=[metadata_1]]], fields=[id, deepNested_nested1, deepNested_nested2_num, metadata_1])

TestCase.name: testNoNestedProjectWithMetadata
TestCase.Resource: SELECT id, deepNested.nested1 AS nested1, deepNested.nested1.`value` + deepNested.nested2.num + metadata_1 as results FROM T

LogicalProject(id=[$0], nested1=[$1.nested1], results=[+(+($1.nested1.value, $1.nested2.num), $2)]) +- LogicalProject(id=[$0], deepNested=[$1], metadata_1=[$2], metadata_2=[$3]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T, metadata=[metadata_1, metadata_2]]])

Calc(select=[id, deepNested.nested1 AS nested1, ((deepNested.nested1.value + deepNested.nested2.num) + metadata_1) AS results]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T, project=[id, deepNested], metadata=[metadata_1]]], fields=[id, deepNested, metadata_1])

TestCase.name: testProjectionPushDownOnly
TestCase.Resource: SELECT id, ts1, tags FROM src

LogicalProject(id=[$0], ts1=[$5], tags=[$2]) +- LogicalProject(id=[$0], name=[$1], tags=[$2], op=[$3], ts=[$4], ts1=[+($4, 10000:INTERVAL SECOND)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, src]])
Calc(select=[id, (ts + 10000:INTERVAL SECOND) AS ts1, tags]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, src, project=[id, ts, tags], metadata=[]]], fields=[id, ts, tags])

TestCase.name: testProjectOnlyRowtime
TestCase.Resource: SELECT rtime FROM T

LogicalProject(rtime=[$1]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[rtime], watermark=[$1]) +- LogicalProject(id=[$0], rtime=[$1], val=[$2], name=[$3], ptime=[PROCTIME()]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]])
WatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[rtime], watermark=[rtime]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T, project=[rtime], metadata=[]]], fields=[rtime])

TestCase.name: testProjectWithoutInputRef
TestCase.Resource: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T
LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[COUNT()]) +- LogicalProject($f0=[0]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]])
GroupAggregate(select=[COUNT(*) AS EXPR$0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T, project=[id], metadata=[]]], fields=[id])

TestCase.name: testProjectWithoutProctime
TestCase.Resource: select name, val, rtime, id from T

LogicalProject(name=[$3], val=[$2], rtime=[$1], id=[$0]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[rtime], watermark=[$1]) +- LogicalProject(id=[$0], rtime=[$1], val=[$2], name=[$3], ptime=[PROCTIME()]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]])
WatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[rtime], watermark=[rtime]) +- Calc(select=[name, val, rtime, id]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]], fields=[id, rtime, val, name])

TestCase.name: testProjectWithoutRowtime
TestCase.Resource: SELECT ptime, name, val, id FROM T

LogicalProject(ptime=[$4], name=[$3], val=[$2], id=[$0]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[rtime], watermark=[$1]) +- LogicalProject(id=[$0], rtime=[$1], val=[$2], name=[$3], ptime=[PROCTIME()]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]])

Calc(select=[PROCTIME_MATERIALIZE(ptime) AS ptime, name, val, id]) +- WatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[rtime], watermark=[rtime]) +- Calc(select=[id, rtime, val, name, PROCTIME() AS ptime]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]], fields=[id, rtime, val, name])

TestCase.name: testReadsComputedColumnWithoutProjectionPushDown
TestCase.Resource: SELECT id, ts1, op FROM src

LogicalProject(id=[$0], ts1=[$5], op=[$3]) +- LogicalProject(id=[$0], name=[$1], tags=[CAST($3):VARCHAR(2147483647) CHARACTER SET "UTF-16LE"], op=[CAST($2):VARCHAR(2147483647) CHARACTER SET "UTF-16LE"], ts=[$4], ts1=[+($4, 10000:INTERVAL SECOND)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, src, metadata=[op, tags, ts]]])

Calc(select=[id, (ts + 10000:INTERVAL SECOND) AS ts1, CAST(op AS VARCHAR(2147483647)) AS op]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, src, metadata=[op, tags, ts]]], fields=[id, name, op, tags, ts])

TestCase.name: testReadsComputedColumnWithProjectionPushDown
TestCase.Resource: SELECT id, ts1, op FROM src

LogicalProject(id=[$0], ts1=[$5], op=[$3]) +- LogicalProject(id=[$0], name=[$1], tags=[CAST($3):VARCHAR(2147483647) CHARACTER SET "UTF-16LE"], op=[CAST($2):VARCHAR(2147483647) CHARACTER SET "UTF-16LE"], ts=[$4], ts1=[+($4, 10000:INTERVAL SECOND)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, src, metadata=[op, tags, ts]]])

Calc(select=[id, (ts + 10000:INTERVAL SECOND) AS ts1, CAST(op AS VARCHAR(2147483647)) AS op]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, src, project=[id], metadata=[op, ts]]], fields=[id, op, ts])

TestCase.name: testRowTimeTableSourceGroupWindow
TestCase.Resource: SELECT name, TUMBLE_END(rowtime, INTERVAL '10' MINUTE), AVG(val) FROM rowTimeT WHERE val > 100 GROUP BY name, TUMBLE(rowtime, INTERVAL '10' MINUTE)

LogicalProject(name=[$0], EXPR$1=[TUMBLE_END($1)], EXPR$2=[$2]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], EXPR$2=[AVG($2)]) +- LogicalProject(name=[$3], $f1=[$TUMBLE($1, 600000:INTERVAL MINUTE)], val=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($2, 100)]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[rowtime], watermark=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, rowTimeT]])

Calc(select=[name, w$end AS EXPR$1, EXPR$2]) +- GroupWindowAggregate(groupBy=[name], window=[TumblingGroupWindow('w$, rowtime, 600000)], properties=[w$start, w$end, w$rowtime, w$proctime], select=[name, AVG(val) AS EXPR$2, start('w$) AS w$start, end('w$) AS w$end, rowtime('w$) AS w$rowtime, proctime('w$) AS w$proctime]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[name]]) +- Calc(select=[rowtime, val, name], where=[(val > 100)]) +- WatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[rowtime], watermark=[rowtime]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, rowTimeT, project=[rowtime, val, name], metadata=[]]], fields=[rowtime, val, name])

TestCase.name: testReadsMetaDataWithDifferentOrder
TestCase.Resource: SELECT ts, id, name, tags, op FROM src

LogicalProject(ts=[$4], id=[$0], name=[$1], tags=[$2], op=[$3]) +- LogicalProject(id=[$0], name=[$1], tags=[CAST($3):VARCHAR(2147483647) CHARACTER SET "UTF-16LE"], op=[CAST($2):VARCHAR(2147483647) CHARACTER SET "UTF-16LE"], ts=[$4], ts1=[+($4, 10000:INTERVAL SECOND)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, src, metadata=[op, tags, ts]]])

Calc(select=[ts, id, name, CAST(tags AS VARCHAR(2147483647)) AS tags, CAST(op AS VARCHAR(2147483647)) AS op]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, src, metadata=[op, tags, ts]]], fields=[id, name, op, tags, ts])

TestCase.name: testReadsMetaDataWithoutProjectionPushDown
TestCase.Resource: SELECT id, ts, tags FROM src

LogicalProject(id=[$0], ts=[$4], tags=[$2]) +- LogicalProject(id=[$0], name=[$1], tags=[CAST($3):VARCHAR(2147483647) CHARACTER SET "UTF-16LE"], op=[CAST($2):VARCHAR(2147483647) CHARACTER SET "UTF-16LE"], ts=[$4], ts1=[+($4, 10000:INTERVAL SECOND)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, src, metadata=[op, tags, ts]]])
Calc(select=[id, ts, CAST(tags AS VARCHAR(2147483647)) AS tags]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, src, metadata=[op, tags, ts]]], fields=[id, name, op, tags, ts])

TestCase.name: testTableSourceWithTimestampRowTimeField
TestCase.Resource: SELECT rowtime, id, name, val FROM rowTimeT
LogicalProject(rowtime=[$1], id=[$0], name=[$3], val=[$2]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[rowtime], watermark=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, rowTimeT]])

Calc(select=[rowtime, id, name, val]) +- WatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[rowtime], watermark=[rowtime]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, rowTimeT]], fields=[id, rowtime, val, name])

TestCase.name: testReadsMetaDataWithProjectionPushDown
TestCase.Resource: SELECT id, ts, tags FROM src

LogicalProject(id=[$0], ts=[$4], tags=[$2]) +- LogicalProject(id=[$0], name=[$1], tags=[CAST($3):VARCHAR(2147483647) CHARACTER SET "UTF-16LE"], op=[CAST($2):VARCHAR(2147483647) CHARACTER SET "UTF-16LE"], ts=[$4], ts1=[+($4, 10000:INTERVAL SECOND)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, src, metadata=[op, tags, ts]]])
Calc(select=[id, ts, CAST(tags AS VARCHAR(2147483647)) AS tags]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, src, project=[id], metadata=[tags, ts]]], fields=[id, tags, ts])

TestCase.name: testTableSourceWithSourceWatermarks
TestCase.Resource: SELECT rowtime, id, name, val FROM rowTimeT

LogicalProject(rowtime=[$1], id=[$0], name=[$3], val=[$2]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[rowtime], watermark=[SOURCE_WATERMARK()]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, rowTimeT]])
Calc(select=[rowtime, id, name, val]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, rowTimeT, watermark=[SOURCE_WATERMARK()]]], fields=[id, rowtime, val, name])
